alert.note: Alert for Adams (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:58PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN ADAMS COUNTY THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 657 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Emmitsburg, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Gettysburg, Carroll Valley, Cashtown, Orrtanna, Fairfield, McKnightstown, Liberty Mountain Resort, Gettysburg National Military Park and Gettysburg College. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
